module.title: Win32 system module
module.description: Various system related checks, such as CPU load, process state, service state memory usage and PDH counters.
module.name: CheckSystem

check_cpu.description: Check that the load of the CPU(s) are within bounds.

check_uptime.desc: Check time since last server re-boot.

check_service.desc: Check the state of one or more of the computer services.

check_process.desc: Check the state of one or more of the processes running on the computer.

check_memory.desc: Check free/used memory on the system.

check_os_version.description: Check the version of the underlaying OS.
